related_post.text: ```pyimport tkinter as tkimport tkinter.font as tkffrom PIL import Image ImageTkroot = tk.Tk()canvas = tk.Canvas(root height=700 width=800)canvas.pack()image = Image.open("triangle.png")bg_image = ImageTk.PhotoImage(image)bg_label = tk.Label(root image = bg_image)bg_label.place(x=0,y=0,relwidth = 1 relheight = 1)fontStyle = tkf.Font(size=40)label = tk.Label(canvas  fg = \'red\ text="WEATHER APP font = fontStyle)label.place(relx = 0.2 rely = 0 height = 60 width = 500)frame = tk.Frame(root,bg = \'#d5eb34\')frame.place(relx = 0.25 rely = 0.1,relheight = 0.05 relwidth = 0.55)entry = tk.Entry(frame bd = 5 )entry.place(relx = 0 rely = 0 relheight = 1 relwidth = 0.7)root.mainloop()```
